text: Small Faces, often referred to as Faces were an English rock band formed in London in 1965. The band originally consisted of singer-songwriter Steve Marriott, keyboardist Ian McLagan, bassist Ronnie Lane, and Kenny Jones, who played in The Rolling Stones. They disbanded in 1978. title: Small Faces
